content: @Sebastien Gouezel @Heather Macbeth sorry to disturb, but just for my personal organization, when could you have time to look at this PR?
My home has been robbed a few days ago, so I have no time for Lean currently, sorry. I'll probably be more active in a few days.

@Nicolò Cavalleri Since #4351 is proposing quite a big change, it is better for Sébastien to review it. But at some point you mentioned that you were planning another PR on GL(n), I would be very happy to start reviewing that!

Sebastien Gouezel said:

My home has been robbed a few days ago, so I have no time for Lean currently, sorry. I'll probably be more active in a few days.

I am very sorry, sorry for urging you!

Heather Macbeth said:

Nicolò Cavalleri Since #4351 is proposing quite a big change, it is better for Sébastien to review it. But at some point you mentioned that you were planning another PR on GL(n), I would be very happy to start reviewing that!
